column5: Is AI being used in the marketing department of your company?
column6: 1. How has the use of AI tools impacted your current marketing role?
column7: 2. Which of the following skills has become more important due to AI integration in marketing?
column8: 3. How comfortable are you with the idea of AI eventually performing tasks currently considered core to your marketing expertise?
column9: 4. To effectively utilize AI tools in marketing, how important is collaboration between humans and AI?
column10: 5. Which aspect of your marketing workflow has been most impacted by AI tools?
column11: 6. How confident are you in your ability to adapt to future changes in marketing due to AI advancements?
column12: 7. In your opinion, what is the biggest challenge marketing professionals face when integrating AI tools?
column13: 8. Which statement best describes your perception of the future of marketing jobs with AI?
column14: 9. How has the use of AI tools affected your work-life balance as a marketing professional?
column15: 11. In your experience, how transparent have your organizations been about the implementation of AI tools in marketing?
column16: 12. Which ethical concern regarding AI use in marketing do you find most pressing?
column17: 13. How willing are you to participate in further training and development to keep up with advancements in AI-powered marketing?
column18: 14. Which statement best describes your overall sentiment towards the integration of AI in the marketing industry?
column19: 15. In your opinion, what is the single most important factor for ensuring a successful human-AI collaboration in the future of marketing?
column20: 16. Which AI-powered social media management tool are you most familiar with?
column21: 17. Which AI-based marketing automation tool would you find most helpful in your work?
column22: 18.  How has the introduction of AI tools affected your workload in the marketing department?
column23: 19.  How has the integration of AI tools affected your daily tasks in the marketing department?
